SENT.plain: Drops of exosome dispersions from healthy epithelial colon cell line and colorectal cancer cells were dried on a superhydrophobic PMMA substrate
The residues were studied by small- and wide-angle X-ray scattering using both a synchrotron radiation micrometric beam and a high-flux table-top X-ray source
Structural differences between healthy and cancerous cells were detected in the lamellar lattices of the exosome macro-aggregates
